metadata.title: CVE-2021-32563 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Thunar before 4.16.7 and 4.17.x before 4.17.2.When called with a regular file as a command-line argument, it delegates toa different program (based on the file type) without user confirmation.This could be used to achieve code execution.

criterions.comment: thunar: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
